Author: whatsYOURtruth
Text: Yeah, it feels like a TRAP!!!   I think it's a way for the eating disorder to sneak back in when I'm doing well.   Strangely, it also makes me feel invalid when the ED is going full force.  So, I guess I feel invalid no matter what. Hmmm, I should probably look into that.   Thanks, OP!

Author: saypleaseplease
Text: me, definitely i dont even know how to talk about how i feel. i know i have a really bad relationship with food and my body and how i view myself. my ex would always invalidate me and any opinion i had about anything was wrong and he would go off telling me why.   so everything i say i feel like im wrong. all i know is i heavily relate to a lot of whats said on this sub and finally feel like the thoughts that i have are somewhat similar to what other people are going through :///   &#x200B;  i really relate to this post
